name: monitor-tool
description: A simple monitoring tool for checking service status

scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run zip
scripts.clean: rd /s /q dist 2>nul || echo No dist folder to clean
scripts.zip: mkdir dist && xcopy . dist\monitor-tool\ /E /I /EXCLUDE:.gitignore && cd dist && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path monitor-tool -DestinationPath monitor-tool.zip"

author: Cline
